documents.document: @amyandcolour Bawl-ton. Or Bowl-ton. That's how everyone in Linenhall says it anyway

I love when the Guinness Rugby ads start creeping back on to tv coming up to the Six Nations. It's like the Coca-Cola truck ad at Christmas
@Kearnflakes a 13km journey for me takes about 45mins to 1hr. In London a 23km journey would take me 25mins....
Considering every other news story or tweet is about Donald Trump...
I usually hate when news websites scrape a story out of a funny poster in a shop or something stupid but it's kinda refreshing now
I don't know how I am going to put up with four years of Trump's administration doing stupid things and everyone complaining about them

I remember watching Obama's inauguration and I was stunned (in a good way) but I'm even more stunned watching Trumps

@shanananbatman I know how thick I get when I see people stoping security to rummage for their liquids. So I pre pack mine to be sound

@YourMa if you work for a U.K company they generally offer them because of the mandatory workplace pension in Britain

Than investing money in some curtain that makes booze disappear.
Like I know excessive drinking is a problem here but surely the money would be better spent on health services/school education programs
Read about the whole motion to hide alcohol in shops. I thought the government would know that hiding something doesn't solve a problem?
2016 being a horrible year just isn't confined to 2016
